title: Add SDG ratings to proposals - AIM
description: Partnering with UN Orgs means Cardano should adopt a common international framework & language of goal setting. This is currently absent.
solution: Create a mechanism to Incorporate SDG parameters and impact evaluation to match with global organizational needs and hubs.
experience: AIM - the team behind the voter-tool, CA-tool, vCA-Tool. Educators, developers, UI & data experts, impact ventures, network to relevant org.
